title: Emperor of Nine Suns - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen   Xuanhuan
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Fast Cultivation   Genius Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Romantic Subplot
author: Brown Sword
description:
Due to a miraculous encounter, a Roc that was bigger than a mountain became a clone for the teenager, Chu Chen. Ever since then, he obtained the key to enter the divine tomb. Within the tomb is an immortal lady sealed inside a jade casket with ice. Inside it were countless immortal treasures, elixirs, magical tools, and so on, free for the taking! 

>
